NationBuilder - Los Angeles, CA & Remote - Full Time - Senior Database Engineer (Los Angeles/Remote):

NationBuilder is an online Community Organizing System built by a world-class team dedicated to empowering a new generation of leaders and creators with the tools they need to create a new world. If you're seeking to build something truly important - a genre-defining new product that is already changing peopleâ€™s lives. Check out what we build: http://nationbuilder.com/mission

Come join our LA team to take ownership of our database systems, with a strong focus on our core PostgreSQL databases, and take our databases to a new level of scalability and performance. http://nationbuilder.com/senior_database_engineer
